Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class RoundStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.RoundStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Round, RoundSpecial1, RoundSpecial10, RoundSpecial11, RoundSpecial12, RoundSpecial2, RoundSpecial3, RoundSpecial4, RoundSpecial5, RoundSpecial6, RoundSpecial7, RoundSpecial8, RoundSpecial9
public abstract class RoundStrategy extends Object
Strategy for special card. Each special extends RoundStrategy and overrides his special methods.

    • conquestIsland

      protected boolean conquestIsland(int islandRef, int noColor, int playerRef)
      It changes towers on an island, remove it to the school's team of higher influence team and put it back in the weaker team's school.
      Parameters:
      islandRef - is the number of the island.
      noColor - is the color of the special 9's effect.
      playerRef - is the number of the player.
      Returns:
      true if game is over.

    • highInfluenceTeam

      protected Team highInfluenceTeam(int islandRef, int noColor, int playerRef)
      It counts influence on the selected island and return the team with higher influence.
      Parameters:
      islandRef - is the number of the island.
      noColor - is the color of the special 9's effect.
      playerRef - is the number of the player.
      Returns:
      the stronger team.

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int queueRef, int desiredMovement, int ref) throws NotAllowedException
      It checks the max movement that player can choose and check if its choose is valid. Then, it moves mother nature and start conquestIsland.
      Parameters:
      queueRef - is the number of the player in the queue.
      desiredMovement - is the number of steps.
      ref - is the reference to a parameter used for special.
      Returns:
      if game is over.
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - if chosen steps is not valid.

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(int playerRef, int colour, boolean inSchool, int islandRef) throws NotAllowedException
      It checks if chosen parameters are valid. Then if player want to move it in school it transfer student from entrane to table. Else if in school is false remove the student from school's entrance and put it on the chosen island.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - is the number of the player.
      colour - is the color of the student chosen.
      inSchool - true if it's in school or false if it's on island.
      islandRef - is the number of the island.
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - if chosen parameters are not valid.
